name: T Minus 2048
description:
This is a classic remake of the all time puzzler 2048! In this you build the rocket right from scratch. Keep on adding similar blocks till you don't make the entire rocket and watch it shoot into space if you are successful...

Here is the block description

  - Empty

  - Scrap (2)

 - Metal Sheets (4)

- Fabrication (8)

- Assembly (16)

 - Engine Nozzle (32)

 - Antenna (64)

 - Payload (128)

 - Launch Platform (256)

 - Gantry Connected (512)

 - T minus 5 4 3 2 1 .... (1024)

And Lift - off

Can you launch the rocket? Are you up for the challenge?

This game was made completely in C++ within a day.... I hope you like the game as much as I enjoyed making it...

P.S. Please do try and rate the game...
